level.heading: SPECIFIC INFORMATION TO BE PROVIDED BY WASHINGTON GAS LIGHT COMPANY (ยง 15-212)

level.text: In cases governed by ยง200, in addition to the filing requirements of ยง200.10, the Washington Gas Light Company shall provide the data required by this section.
The filing shall include an analysis of the following:
Account 930.1 – General Advertising Expenses;
Account 930.2 – Miscellaneous General Expenses;
Account 913 – Advertising Expense; and
Account 909 – Informational Advertising, for the proposed test year and the historical test year.
The analysis required by ยง212.2 shall show, by account, at least the following delineation for the proposed test year and the historical test year:
Industry association dues;
Stockholder and debt serving expenses;
Rate department load studies;
Directors’ fees and expenses;
Dues and subscriptions;
Information Advertising (Account 909), including the following:
Conversation advertising done by the company by types of advertisement and media;
Other informational advertising done by the company; and
Informational advertising done by trade associations;
Promotional Advertising (Account 913.000), including the following:
Advertising done by the company by type of appliance advertised and media used; and
Promotional advertising done by trade associations;
General Advertising Expenses (Account 930.100) including the following:
Institutional advertising done by the company and the media used;
Other general advertising done by the company; and
General advertising done by trade associations.

The filing shall include a schedule showing for the historical test year and the calendar year preceding the historical test year the following information regarding the applicant’s investment in subsidiaries and joint ventures:
The name of each subsidiary or joint venture;
The date of initial investment; and
The amount and type of investment made for each of the periods included in this report.

The filing shall include a balance sheet and income statements for the Company’s subsidiaries and the Company’s joint ventures for the historical test year and the two (2) calendar years preceding the historical test year.

The filing shall include a schedule showing for the historical test year and the calendar year preceding the historical test year dividends or income of any type received by the Company from its subsidiaries and its joint ventures and indicate how this income is reflected in the report filed with the Commission and stockholder reports.

The filing shall include for the historical test year, the following data for officers of Washington Gas Light Company who are also officers of a subsidiary and where a part of the salary is included in the filed cost of service:
The name and title of each officer; and
The annual salary and amount charged to subsidiaries.
The filing shall include gas supply forecasts for the five (5) calendar years after the historical test year.
The filing shall include a copy of the following:
The latest prospectus;
The most recent 10K, and any 8K or 10Q filed subsequent to the 10K;
The latest annual report to shareholders; and
The latest annual report to the Commission.
